TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Adiri, title = Adiri, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adiri} }

S.FORM: Adiri Gaga mniq Pingtung Utaysyang ka alang Adiri. 116 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 347 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 339 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 8 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Rukai93%, Paiwan3%, Bunun1%, ni rahuq na o1%.

Adiri Gaga mniq Pingtong Utaysyang ka alang Adiri. 116 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 347 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 339 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 8 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Rokai93%, Paiwan3%, Bonon1%, ni rahoq na o1%.
